name: Martian Standoff
description:
Made for Global Game Jam 2021

Martian Standoff is a local 2 player stealth game in which you play as one of two rival aliens that can shape-shift into a target by killing them. Hide yourself amongst the crowd to deceive your opponent while collecting damage upgrades and keeping track of your opponent's movements. Beware of getting too close to your rival and triggering a Standoff! Martian Standoff is a battle of reactions and stealth to sneak up on your opponent to gain the upper hand and shoot first.
Player 1 Controls:
WASD: Movement
Space: Kill
Player 2 Controls:
Arrows: Movement
Right Shift: Kill
